titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Lugar. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.

bill.summary: 2/1/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations for the 109th Congress.
